betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6Phyto-Gro§r but better! §aIncreases even more yield and efficiency§r. Some plants might need this instead of the normal §6Phyto-Gro§r.

To make one, you'll need two §6Sawdust§r, §6Niter§r, and §6Rich Slag§r. You can also make more by using Rich Slag, §6Pulverized Charcoal§r, and Niter instead.
